description: A 2-sided fishing and recreation map which covers Little Current, Wikwemikong, Mindemoya, Gore Bay, M’Chigeeng, Meldrum Bay, Providence Bay, South Baymouth, Whitefish Falls, Kagawong and Manitowaning. Includes the island’s famous Cup and Saucer hiking trail and the M’Chigeeng hiking trail. On the reverse, you will find smaller detailed maps of Espanola, Whitefish Falls, Wikwemikong, Mindemoya, Gore Bay, Little Current, Killarney and M’Chigeeng, Manitowaning, Meldrum Bay, Kagawong, South Baymouth, Providence Bay and Blind River.
name: Coordinate GIS Manitoulin Island and North Shore Map
